surah.body:
<<<<<<< HEAD In the name of Allah,Most Gracious, Most Merciful.
Praise be to Allah, the Cherisher and Sustainer of the worlds;
Most Gracious, Most Merciful;
======= In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful. Praise be to Allah, the Cherisher and Sustainer of the worlds; >Most Gracious, Most Merciful; >>>>>>> 0778be35a75b0fea9b8508d9b7253dd58d8a9bf6
Master of the Day of Judgment.
Thee do we worship, and Thine aid we seek. Show us the straight way, <<<<<<< HEAD
The way of those on whom Thou hast bestowed Thy Grace, those whose (portion) is not wrath, and who go not astray.
======= The way of those on whom Thou hast bestowed Thy Grace, those whose (portion) is not wrath, and who go not astray. >>>>>>> 0778be35a75b0fea9b8508d9b7253dd58d8a9bf6
